resources.string: Rhybudd is a Zenoss Events and Device Management App for Android Uses the new Zenoss 3.0 API to poll for, alert on and Acknowledge or delve into Zenoss alerts.
For best results use a short single word to describe the name of the device you are searching for.
The cache is refreshed each time the app loads so there is no need to force a refresh.
Depending on the size of your infrastructure this cache can get quite large. Moving to SD is advisable.
The local cache is emptied each time the app loads but you can flush it manually if required.
